name: eMonstery
description:
Did you know that Halloween was Valentine's day for monsters? As the first ever human employee of eMonstery, the largest monster dating service, its up to you to try and make sure that no monsters go lonely on this special day!

PC/Mac Controls:

Cursor Keys - move the launcher left and right, and change the angle of the shot.
X - fire, hold it down to increase power
Z - precision mode, hold it down to slow movement/angle/power gain

Mobile/Tablet Controls:

You should get onscreen controls, rather than using keys :)

There's a little easter egg in the game, those who aren't very good at it will find it first :)
